title: ChangeMessage
description: JSON schema for a change message

changeNumber.description: The application change number created as a result of this change.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when this change was originally committed.

objectId.description: The unique identifier of the object that changed.

parentId.description: The unique identifier of the parent object.

objectEtag.description: The new Etag of the changed object

objectType.description: The type of the object that changed

changeType.description: The type of change that occurred
changeType.name: ChangeType

isModification.description: true, if this message is for a modification only
